document_data.mainbody:
Rotheloe Tyrneladhelu was an inhabitant of Cormanthyr in the 3 century DR.
Rotheloe Tyrneladhelu was one of the wizards staying back in the hunt for Elminster Aumar in . Selgauth Cathdeiryn later related to the High Court Mage that though theyd prevailed, Rotheloe had completely lost his wits and could not stop crying.
